products.name: Wedge Hit Shield
products.description: The Club Double Wedge Hit Shield is a good addition to your training sessions for a variety of drills which involves breakdown and tackling technique.

products.name: Blitz Mouthguard
products.description: The Blitz Mouthguards are designed for protection, comfort and unobstructed airflow.

products.name: Squistle
products.description: Sounds just like a normal whistle! Squeeze it rather than blow into it for an easy to use whistle.

products.name: Club Netballs
products.description: The Club Netball is the go to in training balls with excellent grip and durability.

products.name: Action Pump
products.description: Fast, dual action inflating pump. Expels air through double action pushing and pulling of the handle
